text: Darshan Mondal (7 June 1940 - 1971) was an Indian gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Indian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of India Category:Gymnasts at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Darshan Mondal
